So if you love dogs like we do, please consider adopting one.

One of the pet owners who adopted one of the Dogs here said this about her new pet...

"Despite all she’s been through, Emma is finally getting a chance to show just how loving she really is. She craves any kind of affection, will stick to her foster like glue and gives wonderful little kisses,” David said. “She is very special and we feel lucky to have been able to rescue her.”

One of the largest challenges facing animal welfare organizations today is the sheer number of animals in need of assistance.
Every year, approximately 6.5 million companion animals arrive at one of the community animal shelters nationwide.

We Rescue Stray Cats as well. Cats are the most Loving Pets to have they do the following:

  • Play with you.
  • They clean themsleves.
  • Give a positive calming effect on you.
